mapper.select: SELECT po.name AS operationName, pm2.name AS menu2Name, pr.name AS roleName, pmo.menu2_code AS menu2Code, pmo.operation_code AS operationCode FROM permission_role_menu2_operation AS prmo INNER JOIN permission_role AS pr ON prmo.role_code = pr.code RIGHT JOIN permission_menu2_operation AS pmo ON prmo.menu2_code = pmo.menu2_code AND prmo.operation_code = pmo.operation_code AND prmo.role_code = #{roleCode} INNER JOIN permission_menu2 AS pm2 ON pmo.menu2_code = pm2.code INNER JOIN permission_operation AS po ON pmo.operation_code = po.code
